name: Sambandh

address: Old Bhubaneswar-Puri NH, Saradeipur, P.O.- Gopinathpur, Uttara

briefDescription: SAMBANDH has traversed through twenty-two meaningful years since its inception.The primary focus of SAMBANDH's programme has been on the right based approach for being with the poor in their struggle to obtain a life of justice and dignity. SAMBANDH directed a good proportion of its resources and energy to the revival of traditional knowledge and culture, bio-diversity conservation with access and benefit sharing and empowerment of the village community. SAMBANDH has its presence in 606 villages, 93 Gram Panchayats and 54 Blocks of 14 districts of Odisha.
